name: POST_asm-groups-group_id-suppressions-search
description:
**This endpoint allows you to search a suppression group for multiple suppressions.**

When given a list of email addresses and a group ID, this endpoint will only return the email addresses that have been unsubscribed from the given group.

on-behalf-of.default: The subuser's username. This header generates the API call as if the subuser account was making the call.

group_id.description: The ID of the suppression group that you would like to search.

recipient_emails.description: The array of email addresses to add or find.

$block: The email address from your search that do exist in the suppression group.
